scripts.build: npm run morphir-elm-make-clean && npm run morphir-gen-spark-with-config
scripts.morphir-gen-spark: morphir-elm gen -t Spark -o ./spark/open_reg_tech_us_lcr/src && echo SPARK GENERATED INTO spark/open_reg_tech_us_lcr/src
scripts.morphir-gen-spark-with-config: morphir-elm gen -t Spark -o ./spark/open_reg_tech_us_lcr/src --custom-config spark.config.json && echo SPARK GENERATED INTO spark/open_reg_tech_us_lcr/src
